stories.text:
We're making an NFT marketplace for the 95% of people without a crypto wallet. It's called Neon, and we're currently testing our beta (https://neonapp.com). We're looking for devs who are passionate about the NFT space and want to bring it to the mass market. We're backed by top investors, including General Catalyst.

Here's the job listing: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1DaptcT0fTr3Lnq3ls5HNrtot3V083bg8HAl1Nvl0L3g/edit?usp=sharing

Feel free to email me at kyle@neonapp.com if you're interested -- excited to hear from you :)
